keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.XCS

Class Classifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.XCS.Classifier

  • public class Classifier
extends java.lang.Object

    The classifier contains two classes, the representation and the parameters. So, the metods of the class are: get and set fitness, action, etc.

    Since:
    JDK1.2

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Written by Albert Orriols (La Salle, Ramón Llull University - Barcelona) 28/03/2004, Modified by Xavi Solé (La Salle, Ramón Llull University - Barcelona) 03/12/2008

    • Constructor Detail

      • Classifier

        public Classifier(double[] condition,
                  int action,
                  int size,
                  int tStamp)

        It constructs a classifier with the condition and the action specified. It's used by the covering operator.

        Parameters:
        condition - is the environtment state
        action - is the action chosen
        size - is the size of the set.
        tStamp - is the time

      • Classifier

        public Classifier(Classifier cl,
                  int tStamp)

        It creates a new classifier copying the representation and the parameters of the classifier passed as a parameter.

        Parameters:
        cl - is the classifier to be copied to the new classifier.
        tStamp - is the current time stamp.

      • Classifier

        public Classifier(Classifier parent1,
                  Classifier parent2,
                  int tStamp)

        It creates a new classifier making a crossover between the parents parametres. Any of the attributes representation are copied because it will be initialized by the GA.

        Parameters:
        parent1 - is the first parent.
        parent2 - is the second parent.
        tStamp - is the current time stamp.

      • Classifier

        public Classifier(java.util.StringTokenizer t)

        It creates a new classifier with the parameters contained in the String. It is used when reading the classifiers from a file.

        Parameters:
        t - StringTokenizer to get the parameters

    • Method Detail

      • mutate

        public boolean mutate(double[] envState)

        Mutates the classifier. It mutates the action and the condition.

        Parameters:
        envState - is the current environtment state. It is necessary for the niched mutation.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the action has been mutated.

      • updateParameters

        public void updateParameters(double P,
                             double microClSum)

        Updates the parameters of a classifier (reinforcement component)

        Parameters:
        P - is the payoff of the current iteration (P = reward + gamma * maxPrediction)
        microClSum - is the numerosity of the action set (all the action set.).

      • updateFitness

        public void updateFitness(double kSum,
                          double k)

        Updates the fitness of a classifier

        Parameters:
        kSum - is the sum of all accuracies.
        k - is the accuracy of the classifier.

      • match

        public boolean match(double[] envState)

        Indicates if the classifier matches with the environmental state

        Parameters:
        envState - is the environment state
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the classifier matches.

        public boolean equals(Classifier cl)

        Parameters:
        cl - is a classifier.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if they are equals.

        public boolean doesSubsume(Classifier cl)

        Returns if the classifier of the class subsumes the classifier passed as a parameter.

        Parameters:
        cl - is the subsumed classifier.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if it subsumes

      • deletionVote

        public double deletionVote(double avFitness)

        Returns the probability of a classifier to be deleted.

        Parameters:
        avFitness - is the average fitness of the set.
        Returns:
        a double with the probability of being deleted.

      • getRep

        public Representation getRep()

        Returns the representation of the classifier.

        Returns:
        a Representation with the condition of the classifier.

      • crossAllele

        public void crossAllele(int i,
                        Classifier parent1,
                        Classifier parent2)

        It crosses a real allele within two parents. If the representation is a ternary representation, a crossover within intervals is not possible because there is only one gene in each position. So, in this case, the gene of the second parent will be copied. In case of being a real representation, a random number is generated to decide where to cross the interval. It it's crossed within the inteval, the crossAllele method will do it.

        Parameters:
        i - position to cross.
        parent1 - is the first parent classifier.
        parent2 - is the second parent classifier.

      • setAllele

        public void setAllele(int i,
                      double lowerValue,
                      double upperValue)

        Sets the allele value

        Parameters:
        i - is the position.
        lowerValue - is the lower value that has to be set.
        upperValue - is the upper value that has to be set.

      • getCompTime

        public int getCompTime()

        Returns the time of the classifier. The difference between timeOfCl and tComp is that the last one is used to the "new reduction" algorithm, while "timeOfCl" is the usual time stamp of XCS

        Returns:
        an integer with the time stamp of the classifier.

      • numberOfDontCareSymbols

        public double numberOfDontCareSymbols()

        Returns the number of don't care symbols in the classifier. It is used by the action set subsumption

        Returns:
        a double with the number of don't care symbols.

      • isMoreGeneral

        public boolean isMoreGeneral(Classifier cl)

        Indicates if the classifier is more general than the classifier passed as a parameter.

        Parameters:
        cl - is the classifier to which the current classifier is compared.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the current classifier is more general

      • couldSubsume

        public boolean couldSubsume()

        Returns if the classifier can subsume. The classifier has to be sufficiently accurate and sufficiently experienced to subsume another classifier.

        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the classifier can subsume.

      • couldReduce

        public boolean couldReduce(double maxReward)

        Returns if the classifier is experienced, and accurate enough to be in the reduction set. Otherwise, the classifier will not be included in the reduction

        Parameters:
        maxReward - is the maximum reward of the environment.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the classifier can be in the reduction set.

      • addUsefulTimes

        public void addUsefulTimes(int num)
        Adds the value passed to the usefulTimes parameter of the classifier
        Parameters:
        num - is the value that has to be added

      • couldComp

        public boolean couldComp()
        Indicates if the classifier is accurate and experienced enough to not be removed from the population
        Returns:
        True if the classifier is accurate and experienced enough or false otherwise.

        Parameters:

      • printNotNorm

        public void printNotNorm(java.io.PrintWriter fout)

        Prints the desnormalized classifier to the specified file.

        Parameters:
        fout - is the file output where the classifier has to be printed.

      • draw

        public void draw(java.io.PrintWriter fout)

        It draws the population to a file. A character allele is drawn as 1 o 0. Otherwise, a real allele is drawn in ten points, which represent the interval [0..1] divided in ten fragments. In each fragment, there can be three types of symbols: . --> The fragment is not covered by the classifier. o --> The fragment is partially covered by the classifier. O --> The fragment is totally covered by the classifier. This notation has been got from Wilson2000 XCSR

        Parameters:
        fout - is the file where the population has to be drawn.
